Determine the final positions of a collection of items based on their initial locations and a specified series of swap operations.
Based on the starting positions of the items and a series of swap commands, determine their final placements.
Determine the final positions of a group of items given their initial locations and a specified sequence of swaps.
Based on the provided initial positions and the series of swaps, determine the final locations of the items.
Identify the ultimate positioning of the items following the execution of the given swaps from their original locations.
